dataObject.content: Thatâ€™s why a new proposal from a bevy of progressive lawmakers comes as a welcome and innovative addition to the policy arsenal: increasing the corporate tax rate in accordance with the gap between CEO pay and median worker pay.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"I believe it is somewhat biased because it describes the proposal to increase the corporate tax as a 'welcome and innovative addition'. Not everyone would agree with this, so it shows bias."}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Personal opinion. Using the terms welcomed and innovative shows a clear bias."}
